thread.title: Lisa J. Price Joins Ankura Trust Company as Managing Director

author: cnbc.com
title: Lisa J. Price Joins Ankura Trust Company as Managing Director

organizations.name: lisa j. price joins ankura trust company

text:
WASHINGTON, Feb. 5, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Ankura Trust Company announced today the appointment of Lisa J. Price as a Managing Director. Ms. Price brings more than 25 years of experience in trust and agency administration, leading administrative teams and coordinating contract negotiations, and ensuring compliance with policies and regulatory issues. She joins Ankura Trust Company, the newly formed New Hampshire-chartered non-depository trust company that will specialize in providing escrow agent, original issuance indenture trustee, successor indenture trustee and loan agency services in distressed and defaulted situations.
Over her career, Ms. Price has managed trustee, escrow, and agent services, as well as acted as primary interface for both internal and external audits. She has worked in the corporate trust departments of the former Chase Manhattan Bank, Citibank, Deutsche Bank, and HSBC Bank USA. Lisa had responsibility for the oversight and negotiation of agreements with professionals and clients to ensure that transaction roles and responsibilities were feasible in relation to respective policies and procedures.
Ankura Trust Company CEO David Sawyer stated, "The addition of Lisa to our team continues to demonstrate our dedication to creating value for and providing seamless execution to our clients. Lisa has a long and successful history of handling administration within the indenture trustee, escrow, and loan agency marketplace which supports Ankura Trust's focus on delivering premier service for our clients."
Kevin Lavin , Ankura Co-President, added, "Lisa is an important component of the Ankura Trust team as her expertise in the administration of indenture trustee and agency services is another example of how Ankura Trust is committed to building a successful trust company."
